standard_clauses.red_flag_if: vague or undefined scope of work
standard_clauses.plain_english: Contract must clearly define the scope of work and deliverables.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: अनुबंध में कार्य का दायरा और डिलीवरेबल्स स्पष्ट रूप से परिभाषित होने चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Contractor shall deliver the following services: [describe scope].

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: payment timeline exceeds 30 days or no payment terms
standard_clauses.plain_english: Payment terms including amount, milestones, and timeline must be specified.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: भुगतान की शर्तें जिसमें राशि, मील के पत्थर और समय-सीमा शामिल होनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: The Client shall pay INR [amount] within [X] days of invoice submission.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: all IP transferred without fair compensation
standard_clauses.plain_english: IP ownership must be clearly defined — who owns the work product.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: बौद्धिक संपदा स्वामित्व स्पष्ट रूप से परिभाषित होना चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: IP rights in the deliverables shall vest with [Party] upon full payment.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: no confidentiality obligations or one-sided NDA
standard_clauses.plain_english: Both parties should maintain confidentiality of shared information.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: दोनों पक्षों को साझा जानकारी की गोपनीयता बनाए रखनी चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Both parties shall maintain confidentiality of proprietary information.

standard_clauses.red_flag_if: termination only by one party or without notice
standard_clauses.plain_english: Both parties should have the right to terminate with reasonable notice.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: दोनों पक्षों को उचित सूचना के साथ समाप्त करने का अधिकार होना चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Either party may terminate with [X] days written notice.

standard_clauses.plain_english: Contract should specify how disputes will be resolved.
standard_clauses.plain_hindi: अनुबंध में विवाद समाधान तंत्र निर्दिष्ट होना चाहिए।
standard_clauses.template_clause: Disputes shall be resolved through arbitration under the Arbitration Act 1996.
